html: The daily things we often take for granted – like plastics, medicines, asphalt on our roads and heating for our food and homes – are a direct result of the tireless work of oil and gas workers. This industry keeps our community and our country moving forward.

html: The safest place to be during a tornado is an underground shelter. If you do not have a windowless basement, the safest place to be is in a small, interior room, a closet bathroom or an interior hallway in the lowest level of your home. Avoid windows and sliding glass doors.
text: The safest place to be during a tornado is an underground shelter. If you do not have a windowless basement, the safest place to be is in a small, interior room, a closet bathroom or an interior hallway in the lowest level of your home. Avoid windows and sliding glass doors.
